mapper.select: SELECT C_ID, M_ID, C_CODE, C_NAME FROM AC_CATEGORY

SELECT M.MO_ID, M.M_ID, M.A_ID, M.A_CODE, C.C_CODE, C.C_NAME, M.D_DATE, M.M_AMOUNT, M.M_MEMO FROM AC_MONTH M, AC_CATEGORY C WHERE M.C_CODE = C.C_CODE AND M.M_ID = #{m_id} AND M.A_CODE = #{a_code} GROUP BY M.MO_ID, M.M_ID, M.A_ID, M.A_CODE, C.C_CODE, C.C_NAME, M.D_DATE, M.M_AMOUNT, M.M_MEMO ORDER BY M.D_DATE

SELECT C.C_CODE c_code, C.C_NAME c_name, SUM(M.M_AMOUNT) m_amount FROM AC_MONTH M, AC_CATEGORY C WHERE M.M_ID = C.M_ID AND M.C_CODE = C.C_CODE AND M.M_ID = #{m_id} AND M.A_CODE = #{a_code} GROUP BY C.C_CODE, C.C_NAME ORDER BY C.C_CODE
